member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE
member.summary: Specifies the sequence in which text is written on its parent element.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE_LRTB
member.summary: Text is written from left to right and top to bottom.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE_RLTB
member.summary: Text is written from right to left and top to bottom.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE_TBRL
member.summary: Text is written from top to bottom and right to left.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE_TBLR
member.summary: Text is written from top to bottom and left to right.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE_LR
member.summary: Text is written from left to right.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE_RL
member.summary: Text is written from right to left.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_WRITING_MODE_TB
member.summary: Text is written from top to bottom.
